name: Michael Phelps

roles_affiliations: Founder of the Michael Phelps Foundation
structured_info.background: Born June 30, 1985, in Baltimore, Maryland, Michael Phelps is an American swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all time, with a total of 28 Olympic medals (23 gold, 3 silver, 2 bronze). He has set numerous Olympic and world records and was named World Swimmer of the Year eight times. He has publicly shared his journey overcoming personal challenges.

summary: Michael Phelps is a highly accomplished American swimmer and the most decorated Olympian in history. Beyond his athletic achievements, he is now a dedicated mental health advocate, inspirational speaker, and founder of the Michael Phelps Foundation, promoting healthy lifestyles.

name: Shawn Ellis

structured_info.background: Shawn Ellis is a speaker and strategist specializing in resilience, helping leaders and teams adapt to change. He is also the author of 'Mastering the Moments, Creator of 5 C's of Change, Thrive'.

summary: Shawn Ellis is a motivational speaker, resilience strategist, and author dedicated to guiding leaders and teams through change and fostering resilience.

name: Joe Roberts

structured_info.background: Joe Roberts overcame personal challenges including homelessness and addiction to become a resilience and change expert, earning the nickname 'The Skidrow CEO'.

summary: Joe Roberts is a former USA Gymnast and now a Leadership Development Expert who draws on his experience overcoming homelessness and addiction to teach resilience and navigating change.

name: Nina Sossamon-Pogue

structured_info.background: Nina Sossamon-Pogue is a multi-faceted professional with a background spanning athletics, broadcasting, and the corporate world. She is known for her transparency in discussing both successes and failures, using these experiences to inspire resilience in others.

summary: Nina Sossamon-Pogue is an accomplished individual who has excelled as a gymnast, news anchor, speaker, and corporate leader, leveraging her life experience to motivate and inspire others through her vulnerability and stories of overcoming challenges.

name: April Hernandez Castillo

structured_info.background: April Hernandez Castillo is recognized for her personal journey as a 'Freedom Writer,' emphasizing her experience overcoming adversity and promoting messages of hope and resilience.

summary: April Hernandez Castillo is a Speaker, Author, and Actor known for sharing her powerful story of overcoming challenges as a 'Freedom Writer' and inspiring others through messages of hope and resilience.
